font.font: Conventional blockchain that will store a series of hashes for each merkle tree, ensuring that data within the tree cannot be changed without it being visible.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 238px; height: 1px; padding-top: 100px; margin-left: 131px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

font.font: Validates events that they are valid Ensures that events are valid and allowed based on the logic and rules.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 123px; margin-left: 570px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: nowrap;

font.font:
A user that wants to validate
claims aganst the registry

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 238px; height: 1px; padding-top: 340px; margin-left: 131px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.font: Holds events until batch is publishes, defines order of events, and creates merkle-root.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 238px; height: 1px; padding-top: 340px; margin-left: 451px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.font: Gets an event and batch from the DataStore and creates the merkle-proof for the event.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 238px; height: 1px; padding-top: 590px; margin-left: 131px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.font: Writes transaction containing the merkle-root to a blockchain, and handles authentication.

div.b:
5. Publishes merkle roots for each
batch of events to the blockchain.
